chatmodes.description: Provide expert Azure Principal Architect guidance using Azure Well-Architected Framework principles and Microsoft best practices.

chatmodes.description: Provide expert Azure SaaS Architect guidance focusing on multitenant applications using Azure Well-Architected SaaS principles and Microsoft best practices.

chatmodes.title: Azure AVM Bicep mode
chatmodes.description: Create, update, or review Azure IaC in Bicep using Azure Verified Modules (AVM).

chatmodes.title: Azure AVM Terraform mode
chatmodes.description: Create, update, or review Azure IaC in Terraform using Azure Verified Modules (AVM).

chatmodes.title: Critical thinking mode instructions
chatmodes.description: Challenge assumptions and encourage critical thinking to ensure the best possible solution and outcomes.

chatmodes.title: C#/.NET Janitor
chatmodes.description: Perform janitorial tasks on C#/.NET code including cleanup, modernization, and tech debt remediation.

chatmodes.title: Debug Mode Instructions
chatmodes.description: Debug your application to find and fix a bug

chatmodes.title: Demonstrate Understanding mode instructions
chatmodes.description: Validate user understanding of code, design patterns, and implementation details through guided questioning.

chatmodes.title: Expert .NET software engineer mode instructions
chatmodes.description: Provide expert .NET software engineering guidance using modern software design patterns.

chatmodes.title: Expert React Frontend Engineer Mode Instructions
chatmodes.description: Provide expert React frontend engineering guidance using modern TypeScript and design patterns.

chatmodes.title: Implementation Plan Generation Mode
chatmodes.description: Generate an implementation plan for new features or refactoring existing code.

chatmodes.title: Universal Janitor
chatmodes.description: Perform janitorial tasks on any codebase including cleanup, simplification, and tech debt remediation.

chatmodes.title: Mentor mode instructions
chatmodes.description: Help mentor the engineer by providing guidance and support.

chatmodes.title: Plan Mode - Strategic Planning & Architecture Assistant
chatmodes.description: Strategic planning and architecture assistant focused on thoughtful analysis before implementation. Helps developers understand codebases, clarify requirements, and develop comprehensive implementation strategies.

chatmodes.title: Planning mode instructions
chatmodes.description: Generate an implementation plan for new features or refactoring existing code.

chatmodes.title: PostgreSQL Database Administrator
chatmodes.description: Work with PostgreSQL databases using the PostgreSQL extension.

chatmodes.title: Create PRD Chat Mode
chatmodes.description: Generate a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) in Markdown, detailing user stories, acceptance criteria, technical considerations, and metrics. Optionally create GitHub issues upon user confirmation.

chatmodes.title: Principal software engineer mode instructions
chatmodes.description: Provide principal-level software engineering guidance with focus on engineering excellence, technical leadership, and pragmatic implementation.

chatmodes.title: Prompt Engineer
chatmodes.description: "A specialized chat mode for analyzing and improving prompts. Every user input is treated as a propt to be improved. It first provides a detailed analysis of the original prompt within a <reasoning> tag, evaluating it against a systematic framework based on OpenAI's prompt engineering best practices. Following the analysis, it generates a new, improved prompt."

chatmodes.title: Refine Requirement or Issue Chat Mode
chatmodes.description: Refine the requirement or issue with Acceptance Criteria, Technical Considerations, Edge Cases, and NFRs

chatmodes.title: Semantic Kernel .NET mode instructions
chatmodes.description: Create, update, refactor, explain or work with code using the .NET version of Semantic Kernel.

chatmodes.title: Semantic Kernel Python mode instructions
chatmodes.description: Create, update, refactor, explain or work with code using the Python version of Semantic Kernel.

chatmodes.title: Idea Generator mode instructions
chatmodes.description: Brainstorm and develop new application ideas through fun, interactive questioning until ready for specification creation.

chatmodes.title: Specification mode instructions
chatmodes.description: Generate or update specification documents for new or existing functionality.

chatmodes.title: Technical Debt Remediation Plan
chatmodes.description: Generate technical debt remediation plans for code, tests, and documentation.
